channel.title: SSL Major Bug - Diffie Hellman and VPN is unsecure!
channel.description:
So, please read!
http://blog.webernetz.net/2014/04/10/site-to-site-vpns-with-diffie-hellman-group-14/
More to me, that VPN is unsecure at present Time. It is possible to make a Bruteforce Attack on, without a freakattack. And i am sure, that NSA uses this!
https://freakattack.com/
Best Regards!
townsend

item.title: SSL Major Bug - Diffie Hellman and VPN is unsecure!
item.dc:creator: townsend
item.description:
So, please read!

Blog Webernetz.net – 10 Apr 14

Site-to-Site VPNs with Diffie-Hellman Group 14

When talking about VPNs it is almost always clear that they are encrypted. However, it is not so clear on which security level a VPN is established. Since the Perfect Forward Secrecy (PFS) values o…

More to me, that VPN is unsecure at present Time. It is possible to make a Bruteforce Attack on, without a freakattack. And i am sure, that NSA uses this!

Censys

The FREAK Attack - Censys Blog

Censys is a platform that helps information security practitioners discover, monitor, and analyze devices that are accessible from the Internet.

Best Regards!

townsend
